title: Spacious Living Rooms, w/Natural light, *Oak Cabinets, W/D, *Porch, HW
description:
Spacious Living Rooms, w/Natural light, *Oak Cabinets, W/D, *Porch, HW
Stunning 3-Bed/2-Bath House in Tacony Available Now! - This 3-Bedroom/2-Bathroom house is located in the Tacony neighborhood of Philadelphia and looks absolutely stunning! This house is available now and ready for immediate move-in.
***To schedule a showing of this house, Contact:: William “  ***Rayw0425ᏀⅿаіⅼСоⅿ
Upon visiting the house you'll immediately notice the large front porch that welcomes you into the home. The living room is very spacious and includes original hardwood flooring throughout. You can comfortably fit a large sectional, coffee table, TV stand, side tables, and more! The hardwood flooring flows continuously into the dining room which can fit an eight-seat dining set with ease!
The kitchen is located off of the dining room and includes decorative flooring, light oak cabinets with gold hardware, a four-burner gas range, full-sized refrigerator, and a tile backsplash! The kitchen leads to the mud room and the first full bathroom. The mud room is perfect for storing coats, shoes and boots, and the bathroom includes decorative tile flooring, a shower stall, and a tile surround! Through the mud room is access to the rear patio which is very large and provides enough space for an outdoor furniture set and a grill!
All three bedrooms are located on the second floor of the home. They all include original hardwood flooring, ample closet space, and ceiling fans which are perfect for air circulation! The master bedroom can fit a king-sized bed with ease, while the other two bedrooms can fit queen-sized beds. All three bedrooms have oversized windows which allow tons of natural light to pour in and make the rooms feel incredibly bright and open!
The second bathroom is located in the hallway and is easily accessible from all three bedrooms. It includes decorative flooring, a modern vanity with storage, and a full-sized bathtub/shower with a gorgeous tile surround! There is also a large closet included in the bathroom which is perfect for storing your linens.
The basement is unfinished and offers plenty of space for additional storage. There is also a full-sized washer and dryer included! In addition to the storage space in the basement, there is also a crawl space in the attic which can be used for even more storage.
Conveniently located in Northeast Philadelphia on Torresdale Ave., this home offers easy access to I-95, Delaware Ave., Frankford Ave., and Roosevelt Blvd. You can easily travel to other Philadelphia neighborhoods in a matter of minutes!
Tenant is responsible for electric, gas, water, and internet/cable in addition to rent

title: Entire house for rent - available immediately!
description:
Come live in one of the youngest, fastest growing neighborhoods in the region! Nestled on a quiet, tree-lined block in East Kensington, this charming home showcases each and every original detail. Upon entering, you will immediately notice the grand open floor plan filled with original wide plank wood flooring, exposed beam ceilings, exposed brick and much more. Not to mention, the 9ft ceilings soar through the living and dining space, keeping the area feeling light and airy. The industrial style kitchen features dark cabinetry, white tiled backsplash, butcher block countertops, and exposed brick walls.
Venture outside into your 50 foot deep backyard oasis: filled with 8 foot long raised beds, a stone patio for seating, green space, old growth, and a privacy fence keeping it totally secluded. Talk about a perfect place to entertain guests, grill, or just relax on a Sunday morning.
The 2nd floor is home to the master bedroom, a full hall bath, and walk-in closet! The bedroom is complete with the original wood flooring, 2 large windows, and the exposed beam ceilings. The adorable hall bath features an exposed brick wall, white geometric tile flooring, a modern vanity, and a large stall shower/tub combo. The walk-in hall closet offers a great amount of storage space.
The top floor features 2 additional rooms with exposed brick, original flooring, an abundance of natural light, and great lofted storage space. Most recently the 3rd bedroom was used as a home office with an additional sitting area.
You'll find full laundry with a brand new dryer in the clean and dry basement which features plenty of head room and is great for storage. The house features new (2020) street facing windows and a newer (2016) radiant heat system and water heater.
Some of the best transportation access in the city is available, with a nearby entrance to I-95, and just a couple of blocks from the Dauphin stop on the Market Frankford Line (the El) find your way to the Navy Yard or Center City with ease. All local transit stops at 30th Street Station, where you can hop on Amtrak or Bolt Bus and be in New York, Baltimore, or DC in a matter of hours. Just along the edge of Fishtown and upcoming Old Kensington, the location rates at 95 in Walkability. A couple blocks away, Frankford Ave has just about everything you could need; the pet supply store and gym are just around the corner, and you can enjoy weekends shopping or enjoying some of the best dining and nightlife in the city.
This property is managed by its former tenants (Katherine and Nate) and is our only property, we know and love the home and are available immediately for any unlikely emergencies. You deal with us directly, no weird management company. The house is pet friendly, the neighbors are lovely and applicants can move in immediately!
Schedule a walk through with us today, we think you'll love it.
Please note, this house is unfurnished, pictures show previous occupants furnishings. Pets (dogs + cats) are allowed with a one-time $500 fee, number of pets is liable to be limited and will be considered on a case by case basis. Water is charged at a fixed rate of $65 / month, all other utilities (gas + electric) are to be paid by tenant. There is a $25 refundable fee for all applications, inquire via email for an application.
